# Function: getRpcUrl()

> **getRpcUrl**(`chainId`): `string` \| `undefined`

Defined in: [src/utils/chains.ts:63](https://github.com/jcam1/sdks/blob/e250c1c73d308610832de5eeca0f586adc98f249/packages/core/src/utils/chains.ts#L63)

Returns the default RPC URL of the specified chain.

## Parameters

### chainId

Chain ID

#### chainId

`number`

## Returns

`string` \| `undefined`
